metadata.title: CVE-2024-36880 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: add missing firmware sanity checksAdd the missing sanity checks when parsing the firmware files beforedownloading them to avoid accessing and corrupting memory beyond thevmalloced buffer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
